#summary Maven dependency details.

= Introduction =

Mutability Detector and Mutability Detector 4 FindBugs are now available with maven (and compatible build tools) from Maven Central.


= Mutability Detector =

{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>org.mutabilitydetector</groupId>
  <artifactId>MutabilityDetector</artifactId>
  <version>0.8</version>
  <scope>test</scope>
</dependency>
}}}

For users of other dependency/build tools, the relevant information is:

|| Group ID	|| Artifact ID	|| Version ||
|| org.mutabilitydetector	|| !MutabilityDetector	|| 0.8 ||
